Pre-Game Insights: Dejounte Murray said, 'That's a guy teams are going to load up on. He's going to be able to get guys (open) shots and allow that to open things up for himself. We don't want him to feel like he has to come save the world. Get in a rhythm and flow of things.'
Dejounte Murray highlighted that Zion Williamson is excited to play and that the team is excited to add him back to the team.
CJ McCollum, who has been one of the NBA's best scorers and perimeter shooters over the past five games, is praised by Dejounte Murray.
Pelicans starting lineup will include Dejounte Murray, CJ McCollum, Herb Jones, Trey Murphy, and Yves Missi, with Murphy ruled out due to a left ankle sprain and Brandon Ingram in the same status.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Minnesota Scouting Report highlights offensive and defensive rankings, key players, and shooting statistics.
Minnesota's Anthony Edwards scored a career-high 53 points and is averaging 25.6 ppg with 4.2 treys per game.
Naz Reid, the Sixth Man of the Year winner, is Minnesota's third-leading scorer at 12.7 ppg and fourth-leading rebounder (5.0 rpg).
Minnesota is 11-12 in clutch games this season, with Edwards tied for second in the NBA in clutch points (70).
The Wolves rank in the top six in all major three-point shooting categories.
